original_title: A Riddle from my past lives
overview: Sparks burn below the surface. They carry the secret of what I experienced before. Into which distance was I? Where were the tears that now are so cold on my cheeks? I'm sure they've been here for a long long long time. A found footage unsigned film made from various videos collected on youtube (clips, film scenes, video tests, filmed escapades, foggy documents, etc.) created under the impulse of Carlos Casas and the work of Wang Yuyan, Mary Helena Clark and Stefano Miraglia.
title: A Riddle from my past lives
